links.*: Of the Sun and Moon and the Hiding of Valinor

wikitext.*:
The '''Woods of Oromë''', dominions of the [[Valar|Vala]] [[Oromë]], were in [[Valinor]], in the southern part of the land.  To the west lay the [[Pastures of Yavanna]] while to the east rose the [[Hyarmentir]], and beyond was the narrow land of [[Avathar]].<ref>{{S|Darkening}}</ref>

The [[Maiar|Maia]] [[Tilion]] is told to have lived in the woods of Oromë from where he went to [[Lórien (Valinor)|Lórien]] when he would rest.<ref>{{S|Sun}}</ref>
